title: About me
description:
👨🏻‍🎓 Graduated in May, 2020 in University of Minnesota, B.S in Computer science. Went to academy to learn more about Web/app development and currently, working in Seoul National University hospital as a Web/software developer. 
🧑🏻‍🎨 Based on what I love and what I learned, my goals are to create better web/app services and upgrade applications more convenient and fun way for the users. 
👨🏻‍💻 Today, I opened my laptop to become not just a programmer but a developer.
